title: Finalizer not running
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Copy the code from here: http://pastie.org/950783
2. Run it: rm -f /tmp/finalizertest && 6g finbug.go && 6l finbug.6
&& ./6.out

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
When the program exits, I expect /tmp/finalizertest to be deleted, but the finalizer
does not 
seem to run. 

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux/amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
00a2c89d642d+ tip
